name: Paparazzi (itch) (Floood)
description:
Paparazzi is a game wherein you play as a famous person trying to evade the paparazzi. Its a challenging game involving double jumping, mountain climbs, and missiles! There is a small story too, nothing too complex.

Paparazzi was made for the 2022 Brackeys game jam. It was made entirely by two Canadian highschoolers, myself and Lukemonkinz.

If it wasn't clear, to shoot aim with the mouse and press the left mouse button!

Find the soundtrack on Youtube or on SoundCloud!

If any issues with the game arise, please feel free to contact me at flooodmusic@gmail.com
